ItemsActions.MemosphereNote:
Experience scales with skill level.
Experience = {timesLevel}× {skill} Level
ItemsActions.RockStarAmuletNote: This item takes {rollAmount} rolls on the [[Special:MyLanguage/Gems#Gem_Pouch_Table|Gem Pouch Table]].

ItemTypes.Crafted: The {itemName} [[Special:MyLanguage/Items | item]] is a [[Special:MyLanguage/Crafted | crafted item]].
ItemTypes.Loot: The {itemName} [[Special:MyLanguage/Items | item]] is a [[Special:MyLanguage/Loot | loot item]].
ItemTypes.Pet egg: The {itemName} [[Special:MyLanguage/Items | item]] is a [[Special:MyLanguage/Pet_Eggs | pet egg]].

ItemsIntroDescription.None: The {itemName} [[Special:MyLanguage/Items | item]] cannot currently be obtained.

Plurals.AchievementCompletion: It can be given as a reward for completing [[Special:MyLanguage/Achievements | achievements]].
Plurals.AchievementPoint: It can be given as a reward for gaining enough [[Special:MyLanguage/Achievement Points | achievement points]].
Plurals.Activity: It can be dropped from [[Special:MyLanguage/Activities | activities]].
Plurals.Chest: It can be found in [[Special:MyLanguage/Chests | chests]].
Plurals.FactionRepeatingReward: It can be given as a repeating reward for gaining enough [[Special:MyLanguage/Faction Reputation | faction reputation]].
Plurals.FactionReward: It can be given as a reward for gaining enough [[Special:MyLanguage/Faction Reputation | faction reputation]].
Plurals.ItemAttribute: It can be dropped as a special result of [[Special:MyLanguage/Item_Finding_(Mechanics) | special drop table]] [[Special:MyLanguage/Attributes | attributes]].
Plurals.JobBoard: It can be given as a reward for completing [[Special:MyLanguage/Job Boards | job board task]].
Plurals.RecipeMain: It can be created using [[Special:MyLanguage/Recipes | transformation skill recipes]].
Plurals.RecipeSecondary: It can be received as a secondary output from [[Special:MyLanguage/Recipes | transformation skill recipes]].
Plurals.Shop: It can be purchased at some [[Special:MyLanguage/Shops | shops]].
Plurals.ShopPayment: It can be given as payment for selling items to some [[Special:MyLanguage/Shops | shops]].

Singulars.Chest: It can be found in a [[Special:MyLanguage/Chests | chest]].
Singulars.FactionRepeatingReward: It can be given as a repeating reward for gaining enough [[Special:MyLanguage/Faction Reputation | faction reputation]].
Singulars.FactionReward: It can be given as a reward for gaining enough [[Special:MyLanguage/Faction Reputation | faction reputation]].
Singulars.ItemAttribute: It can be dropped as a special result of a [[Special:MyLanguage/Item_Finding_(Mechanics) | special drop table]] [[Special:MyLanguage/Attributes | attribute]].

ItemSources.ActivityRollNote: <sup>†</sup>Note: This activity rolls for loot more than once.
ItemSources.ChestRollNote: <sup>†</sup>Note: Chests roll for loot multiple times.
ItemSources.NoSources: This item cannnot currently be obtained from any source.
ItemSources.RecipeRollNote: <sup>†</sup>Note: This recipe rolls for bonus rewards more than once.
ItemSources.WEARNote: <sup>‡</sup>[[Special:MyLanguage/WEAR|W.E.A.R]] is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.

ItemsRequirements.None: This item has no requirements to use it.

ItemUses.DefaultCollectible: This item grants 1 [[Special:MyLanguage/Achievement Points|achievement point]] when found.
ItemUses.DefaultConsumable: This item may be consumed for a temporary buff.
ItemUses.DefaultGear: This item may be equipped to your character.
ItemUses.DefaultMaterial: This item is not currently used by any recipe or special use.
ItemUses.DefaultMemosphere: Memospheres can be used to gain experience.
ItemUses.NoUses: This item currently has no special uses.

Keywords.activityIntro: The following are all of the [[Special:MyLanguage/Activities | activities]] that use the '''{Keyword_Name}''' activity keyword.
Keywords.bannedKeywordMultiple: This is a '''Banned Keyword''' and part of a banned keyword group you are only allowed to equip one item with any of these keywords in your tool slots at the same time:
Keywords.bannedKeywordSingular: This is a '''Banned Keyword''' you are only allowed to equip one item with the same banned keyword in your tool slots at the same time.
Keywords.consumableIntro: The following are all of the [[Special:MyLanguage/Consumables | consumables]] that use the '''{Keyword_Name}''' consumable keyword.
Keywords.equipmentIntro: The following are all of the [[Special:MyLanguage/Equipment | gear and tools]] that use the '''{Keyword_Name}''' equipment keyword.
Keywords.gearSetIntro: The following are all of the [[Special:MyLanguage/Equipment | gear and tools]] that use the '''{Keyword_Name}''' gear set keyword.
Keywords.locationIntro: The following are all of the [[Special:MyLanguage/Locations | locations]] that use the '''{Keyword_Name}''' location keyword.
Keywords.materialIntro: The following are all of the [[Special:MyLanguage/Materials | materials]] that use the '''{Keyword_Name}''' material keyword.
Keywords.recipeIntro: The following are all of the [[Special:MyLanguage/Recipes | recipes]] that use the '''{Keyword_Name}''' recipe keyword.
Keywords.returnString: Go back to the {keywordImage} [[Special:MyLanguage/Keywords#{keywordType} | Keywords]] page.
Keywords.serviceIntro: The following are all of the [[Special:MyLanguage/Services | services]] that have the '''{Keyword_Name}''' service keyword.
Keywords.supporterIntro: The following are all of the [[Special:MyLanguage/Equipment | gear and tools]] suggested by cult leaders that are currently in the game.
Keywords.weightIntro:
The following are all of the [[Special:MyLanguage/Items | items]] that use the '''{Keyword_Name}''' weight keyword.

It changes the maximum size of the stack of items in your to {stackSize} per stack.

Helpers.autoString: This page is updated automatically to reflect information in the [[Special:MyLanguage/Versions | current game version]].
Helpers.unknownString: This page reflects information for an '''Unknown''' game version.
Helpers.versionString: This page has been updated to reflect information in game version:

Inputs.Plural: This activity requires the following items be supplied for each action:
Inputs.Singular: This activity requires the following item be supplied for each action:

Intro.Movement: This is a [[Special:MyLanguage/Movement_Activities|movement activity]], you will be teleported to {locationEntry} upon completion of an action.

Locations.None: This activity currently has no location it can be done at.
Locations.Plural: This activity can be done at the following locations:
Locations.Singular: This activity can be done at the following location:

LootTables.SpecialTableNote: Each of the secondary drops is rolled independently of the others.

Visibility.actionNotDone: It is only visible if you ''haven't'' done the following:

Visibility.keywordNotEquipped: It is only visible if you ''don't'' meet the following keyword requirements:

Bank.hasDeposit: This building allows you to '''deposit''' your items into the bank.
Bank.hasWithdraw: This building allows you to '''withdraw''' your items from the bank.

Intro.character: It is home to the character {characterName}.
Intro.main: {buildingName} is a "{buildingType}" [[Special:MyLanguage/Buildings | building]] located in {buildingLocation} in the {buildingRegion} region.
Intro.noCharacter: There currently is no [[Special:MyLanguage/Characters | character]] here.

Requirements.mainReq: This building can only be entered if the following requirement has been met:
Requirements.mainReqs: This building can only be entered if the following requirements have been met:
Requirements.negReq: This building can ''not'' be entered if the following requirement has occured:
Requirements.negReqs: This building can ''not'' be entered if the following requirements have occured:

Visibility.keywordNotEquipped: It is only visible if you ''don't'' meet the following keyword requirements:

Intro.main: {characterName} is a [[Special:MyLanguage/Characters | character]] who can be found at {characterLocation} in {buildingLocation} in the {buildingRegion} region.

Quotes.none: {characterName} dosen't feel like speaking at this moment.

Rumors.none: {characterName} currently has no rumors to share.

findingAttribute.birdNests: They can have the odds of finding them increased with the [[File:Bird Nest.svg|20px]] '''[[Special:MyLanguage/Find Bird Nests (Mechanics)|Find Bird Nests]]''' [[Special:MyLanguage/Find_Bird_Nests_Items|equipment]] [[Special:MyLanguage/Attributes|attribute]].
findingAttribute.chestFinding: They can have the odds of finding them increased with the [[File:Chest Finding.svg|20px]] '''[[Special:MyLanguage/Chest Finding (Mechanics)|Chest Finding]]''' [[Special:MyLanguage/Chest_Finding_Items|equipment]] [[Special:MyLanguage/Attributes|attribute]].

lootIntro.adventuringGuild: These are the sub-tables for the various [[Special:MyLanguage/Materials|materials]] and [[Special:MyLanguage/Items|items]] that can come from these [[Special:MyLanguage/Chests|chests]].
lootIntro.birdNest: These are the sub-tables for the various [[Special:MyLanguage/Materials|materials]] that can come from these [[Special:MyLanguage/Chests|chests]].
lootIntro.chestRolls: These treasury items take {number} independant loot rolls when they are opened.
lootIntro.coinPouch: This is the table for [[Special:MyLanguage/Coins|coins]] that can come from these pouches (similar to other [[Special:MyLanguage/Chests|chests]]).
lootIntro.gemPouch: This is the table for [[Special:MyLanguage/Gems|gems]] that can come from these pouches (similar to other [[Special:MyLanguage/Chests|chests]]).
lootIntro.genericChest: These are the sub-tables for the various [[Special:MyLanguage/Materials|materials]], [[Special:MyLanguage/Coins|coins]], and [[Special:MyLanguage/Items|items]] that can come from these [[Special:MyLanguage/Chests|chests]].
lootIntro.rustyChest: These are the sub-tables for the various [[Special:MyLanguage/Materials|materials]], and [[Special:MyLanguage/Items|items]] that can come from these [[Special:MyLanguage/Chests|chests]].

sources.adventuringGuild: It can be purchased from the [[Special:MyLanguage/Buildings#outpostType|Adventurers' Guild Buildings]].
sources.coral: It can be dropped from most [[Special:MyLanguage/{pageName}#itemSourcesSection|activities]] in [[Special:MyLanguage/Syrenthia|Syrenthia]].
sources.genericActivities: It can be found by completing various [[Special:MyLanguage/{pageName}#itemSourcesSection|activities]].
sources.regional: It can be [[Special:MyLanguage/{pageName}#itemSourcesSection|received as rewards]] from [[Special:MyLanguage/Job Boards|Job Boards]] and [[Special:MyLanguage/Faction Reputation|Faction Reputation]].
sources.skilling: It can drop while doing {skillName} activities, and can be obtained from some [[Special:MyLanguage/{pageName}#itemSourcesSection|other sources]]. These [[Chests]] are the only way to obtain some {skillName} based [[Special:MyLanguage/Equipment|Equipment]].
sources.sunken: It can be dropped from some [[Special:MyLanguage/{pageName}#itemSourcesSection|sea related activities]].

chestPages.travelingCalc:
Traveling uses a special function to calculate drop rates for Agility Chests rather than the fixed per action rate in other activities. This is to prevent farming of chests through constant short trips.
(0.096736 × 2) × (2.718280.0165921 × ''Buffed Skill Level'') × ''Distance''

Activities.emergency: These '''Emergency Activities''' are only visible if you are missing key items for traveling, and are there to prevent softlocks.
Activities.hidden: These '''Hidden Activities''' are only visible if you meet the requirements first.
Activities.main: The following [[Special:MyLanguage/Activities | activities]] always available at this location.

Buildings.main: The following [[Special:MyLanguage/Buildings | buildings]] can be visited at this location.

Factions.main: {locationName} is a member of the following [[Special:MyLanguage/Faction_Reputation | factions]]:

Intro.main: {locationName} is a [[Special:MyLanguage/Locations | location]] that can be found in the {locationRegion} region.

Keywords.main: The following [[Special:MyLanguage/Keywords#Location_Keywords | keywords]] apply to this location.

Routes.main: The following [[Special:MyLanguage/Routes | routes]] are available at this location.

Services.main: The following [[Special:MyLanguage/Services | services]] can be used at this location.

Abilities.unlock: This ability is unlocked at level {unlockLevel}.

Attributes.unlock: These attributes are active at level {unlockLevel}.

Experience.ChangeToAdult: This pet will become an '''Adult''' when it reaches level {nextLevel}.
Experience.ChangeToJuvenile: This pet will become a '''Juvenile''' when it reaches level {nextLevel}.
Experience.XPGain: Requires an additional {addedExperienceNum} experience to advance to level {nextLevel}. ({totalExperienceNum} total experience required)

Intro.normal: {petName} is a [[Special:MyLanguage/Pets | pet]]. It hatches from a {eggName}.
Intro.rare: {petName} is a rare [[Special:MyLanguage/Pets | pet]]. It hatches from a rare {eggName}.
Intro.stageAdult: This pet is an Adult at level {adultLevel}.
Intro.stageEgg: This pet is an Egg from level 0 to level 1.
Intro.stageJuvi: This pet is a Juvenile from level 1 to {adultLevel}.

Names.main: These are the default names this pet can have when it first hatches:

Requirement.NoXPReq: This pet has no special requiremetns to gain experience.

Shops.allBuy: This shop has items for sale.
Shops.allSell: All normal items may be sold at this shop.
Shops.limitedSell: Only these items may be sold at this shop.
Shops.noBuy: This shop currently has nothing for sale.
Shops.noSell: Nothing may be sold at this shop.
Shops.restrictedSell: Only some items may be sold at this shop.
Shops.specialSell: These items can be sold to this shop in addition to all normal items.
